# How to make panels in the xaringan slide

```{r echo=FALSE}
xaringanExtra::use_panelset()
library(palmerpenguins)
library(ggplot2)
```

.panelset[

.panel[.panel-name[Code]

```{r plot-code, eval=FALSE}
penguins %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = sex)) +
  geom_bar()
```


]

.panel[.panel-name[Output]

```{r ref.label="plot-code", echo=FALSE, out.width="40%"}

```

]

# How to make panel for the table

.panelset[

.panel[.panel-name[Code]

```{r peng-table, eval=FALSE}

library(kableExtra)
library(tidyverse)

penguins %>% 
  select(2:5) %>% 
  head() %>% 
  kbl() 
```
